maps/dreams/eighth.json/entities/191/set.orig: I call it the field of the indecisive flowers!
maps/dreams/eighth.json/entities/191/set.text: J'appelle ça le champ des fleurs indécises.

maps/dreams/eighth.json/entities/191/set.orig: You like this place, don't you?
maps/dreams/eighth.json/entities/191/set.text: Tu aimes cet endroit, pas vrai ?

maps/dreams/eighth.json/entities/191/set.orig:
I suppose it's as good as it gets 
for a bleak location like this.
maps/dreams/eighth.json/entities/191/set.text:
J'imagine qu'on trouvera pas mieux
dans un endroit aussi morne.

maps/dreams/eighth.json/entities/191/set.orig:
It definitely beats being stuck 
in that one room all the time.
maps/dreams/eighth.json/entities/191/set.text:
C'est toujours mieux que de rester
coincé dans cette salle tout le temps.

maps/dreams/eighth.json/entities/191/set.orig:
It would be nice to show you
all the other places out there...
maps/dreams/eighth.json/entities/191/set.text:
... Si seulement je pouvais te
montrer tous les autres lieux...

maps/dreams/ninth.json/entities/195/sett.orig: How are your hands doing today?
Haha, sorry. It's not as painful as it looks, I swear.
maps/dreams/ninth.json/entities/195/sett.text: Haha, désolé. Ce n'est pas aussi douloureux que ça n'en a l'air, je te le jure !

maps/dreams/ninth.json/entities/195/sett.orig: Again with the weird hand tricks, Tronny?
maps/dreams/ninth.json/entities/195/sett.text: Encore avec tes tours de main curieux, Tronny ?

maps/dreams/ninth.json/entities/195/sett.orig: What? I'm just fascinated by how well it's synchronized.
maps/dreams/ninth.json/entities/195/sett.text: Ben quoi ? Je suis juste fasciné par comment c'est si bien synchronisé.

maps/dreams/ninth.json/entities/195/sett.orig: You don't have to make these creepy shapes to prove it.
maps/dreams/ninth.json/entities/195/sett.text: Tu n'as pas besoin de faire ces gestes aussi horripilants pour le prouver.

maps/dreams/ninth.json/entities/195/sett.orig: Oh man... not looking forward to that jungle.
maps/dreams/ninth.json/entities/195/sett.text: Oh... Je n'ai vraiment pas envie d'aller dans cette jungle.

maps/dreams/ninth.json/entities/195/sett.orig: You know... those places are usually filled with insects and bugs?
maps/dreams/ninth.json/entities/195/sett.text: Tu sais... ça grouille toujours d'insectes et de cafards là-dedans.

maps/dreams/ninth.json/entities/195/sett.orig: Please don't let me go there alone, Lea.
maps/dreams/ninth.json/entities/195/sett.text: S'il te plait, me laisse pas aller là-bas toute seule, d'accord ?
Lea ? Est-ce que tout va bien ?

maps/dreams/ninth.json/entities/195/sett.orig: Oui... why are you sitting here like that?
maps/dreams/ninth.json/entities/195/sett.text: Oui... pourquoi est-ce que tu t'assoies par terre comme ça ?

maps/dreams/ninth.json/entities/195/sett.orig: You know...\. If something is bothering you, you can just tell us about it.
maps/dreams/ninth.json/entities/195/sett.text: Tu sais.... Si quelque chose te tracasse, tu peux nous le dire.
C'est à ça que les \c[3]amis\c[0] servent, non ?

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/1/sett.orig: The door is locked, correct? It seems we are trapped.
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/1/sett.text: La porte est verrouillée, c'est ça ? On dirait que l'on est piégé ici.

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.orig: Oh, you're awake?
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.text: Oh, tu es réveillée ?

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.orig:
You looked so peaceful while you were sleeping...
I didn't want to wake you up.
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.text:
Tu semblais si paisible quand tu dormais...
Je ne voulais pas te réveiller.

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.orig:
Anyway, shall we revisit 
the lesson from yesterday?
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.text:
Sinon, est-ce que tu veux
recommencer la leçon d'hier ?

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.orig: Hello.
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.text: Bonjour.

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.orig: Long time no see.
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.text: Ça fait longtemps qu'on s'est pas vu.

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.orig: ... They denied my proposal. Again.
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.text: ... Ils ont refusé ma proposition. Encore.

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.orig: Dammit, I'm here to come up with interesting game scenarios and challenges.
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.text: Bon sang, je suis là pour apporter des scénarii intéressants et des défis.
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.note: most creative ppl i know insist on using scénarii, even if 1990 says scénarios. That would fit Gautham...

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.orig: I need a little bit of creative freedom to do my job.
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.text: J'ai besoin d'un peu de liberté créatrice pour faire mon travail.

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.orig: Gautham, that is what teamwork is all about.... You have to find a compromise.
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.text: Gautham, ça fait partie du travail d'équipe... Il faut trouver un compromis.

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.orig: Tsk... the best we'll ever get is mediocrity that way.
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.text: Pff... Le mieux que l'on pourra obtenir avec ça, c'est de la médiocrité.

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.orig: There are too many conventional thinkers in this company...
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.text: Il y a trop de penseurs traditionnels dans cette boite...

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.orig: Right, Satoshi?
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.text: N'est-ce pas, Satoshi ?

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.orig: What can I say?\. They just want to keep making the games they know.
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.text: Qu'est-ce que je peux dire ?\. Ils veulent juste continuer à faire les jeux qu'ils connaissent.

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.orig: They have a genius like you on board and don't make proper use of it!
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.text: C'est franchement dommage qu'ils ne savent pas utiliser correctement ton génie.

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.orig: Rejecting your big AI project proposal...
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.text: En rejetant comme ça ta proposition pour un gros projet d'IA...

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.orig: Well, to be honest...\. that went way beyond what you would need for a game like CrossWorlds.
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.text: Bien, pour être honnête...\. Cela va bien au-delà de ce qu'un jeu comme CrossWorlds a besoin.

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.orig: Are you sure?\. I think there are a lot of applications.
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.text: Tu es sûr ?\. Moi je vois plein d'applications.

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.orig: In fact, I'm currently working on a list of them.
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.text: En fait, j'étais en train d'en faire une liste.

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.orig: So you plan to pitch the idea to them again?
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.text: Donc tu penses leur présenter ton idée encore une fois ?

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.orig: Of course I will! It's just way too promising!
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.text: Bien sûr ! Ce projet est juste tellement prometteur !

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.orig: What? I don't work that much, really...
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.text: Hein ? Je ne travaille pas tant que ça, en fait...

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.orig: And I do it because it's what I want to do. No need to worry.
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.text: Et je le fais seulement parce ce que c'est ce que je veux faire. Ne t'inquiète pas.

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.orig: You should listen to your dear caring sister, Mr. Workaholic.
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.text: Tu devrais écouter ta chère sœur attentionnée, M. Rentre-tard

maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.orig: You too, Sergey?!
maps/dreams/seventh.json/entities/28/set.text: Tu ne vas pas t'y mettre aussi, Sergey ?!

maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/1/settin.orig: The door is locked, correct? It seems we are trapped.
maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/1/settin.text: La porte est verrouillée, c'est ça ? On dirait que l'on est piégé ici.

maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.orig:
Let me tell you a little trick 
about conversations.
maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.text:
Laisse-moi te donner une petite
astuce pour les conversations.

maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.orig:
People... they like to 
share their stories.
maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.text:
Les gens... aiment raconter
leurs histoires.

maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.orig:
So if you want to be on their 
good side...\. listen to them.
maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.text:
Donc si tu veux bien te faire
voir d'eux...\. Écoute-les.

maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.orig:
Add a few comments, ask questions...
let them know you are interested.
maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.text:
Fais quelques commentaires, pose des questions...
Donne-leur l'impression que tu es intéressée.

maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.orig:
Keep the conversation flowing naturally, 
but let them do the talking.
maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.text:
Laisse les parler comme ils veulent,
mais continue la conversation.

maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.orig:
That's how people
enjoy your company.
maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.text:
C'est comme ça que les
gens apprécieront ta compagnie.

maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.orig:
However...\. none of this works, 
if the other person can't talk.
maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.text:
Mais...\. Ça ne fonctionne pas du tout
si l'autre personne ne peut pas parler.

maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.orig:
I found that out the hard way... 
when I met her.
maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.text:
J'ai du en faire l'amère
expérience... avec elle.

maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.orig:
She could only listen, 
very much like you.
maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.text:
Elle ne pouvait qu'écouter,
exactement comme toi.

maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.orig:
So for once...\.
I had to do the talking.
maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.text:
Donc pour une fois...\. il fallait
que je fasse la conversation.
Et que je parle...\. de moi.

maps/dreams/the-room.json/entities/0/set.orig: The door is locked, correct? It seems we are trapped.
maps/dreams/the-room.json/entities/0/set.text: La porte est verrouillée, c'est ça ? On dirait que l'on est piégé ici.
